data.name: Monster
data.detailed_description:
This is a twisted tale of a princess and her slave. The princess is gorgeous, out of this world and has captured everyone’s eyes with her charisma. She is kind to her people and they all adore her. However, reality is often hidden behind what we see. And it’s no different here. The princess has a slave named MC and she is often seen torturing him. Visiting the royal library recently, MC stumbled upon a magical book. So, how will MC take advantage of the book, let’s find out.

Features
  • A Slice of Life Game Experience
  • Mini-Game
  • Animated Character
  • Time Management System
  • Multiple Maps to Explore
  • Multiple options
  • Multiple endings

Princess

Popular girl because of her charm, charisma and kindness. However, deep inside she has superiority complex and scorns at middle and lower class. She treats MC as her toy and never let go an opportunity to humiliate him.

Speed control, expression changes:

Disgusted expression after ejaculation:



Priest

Priest is full of youth and partial towards girls, particularly the princess. She adores the princess and hates men including MC. However, she is a little worried because of the royal magic book that has gone missing and talks to MC about it.

data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 18.
This game contains mildly nudity content and sexually suggestive content, General Mature Content. please be aware.
